name: PK2: Remastered
description:
PK2: Remastered is an old-school heroes-inspired strategy for iOS. Beautiful graphics and well-thought gameplay allow you to spend hours playing this game! You control knights, that gather resources, conquer castles and new lands, and fight your opponents.

This is a completely remastered version, supporting all screen sizes!

The game has:
* 7 factions: Knight, Barbarian, Necromancer, Sorceress, Wizard, Warlock, Varangian.
* Hot-seat mode that allows several people to play using one computer.
* 180 creature types
* 114 artifacts
* Over 70 maps to play (available as an in-app purchase).
